name: Trashy Universe Webgl
description:
This is a game I made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42!

This Ludum Dare's Theme was "Running Out of space"

Universe is Trashy! - Robots are producing more and more space junks

      - Freeze them by shooting them, temporarily preventing them from moving  or produce junks - Clean the junk without colliding with them

- Don't Get Overwhelmed my Increasing number of junks

How to Play - Press W to accelerate

- Left mouse click to shoot   - If you miss, your bullet will turn into a junk   - You can also use it to freeze the robots

- Move your mouse to look around

Important!  It's Best Not to use Full screen mode. It breaks the aspect ratio.
